update.description: * Updated for payment method for INR.. * Updated to process parameterised download url. * Update to save current download on closing the app. * Updated for Registration screen. * Updated to support torrent and FTP protocols.. * Updated to differentiate between resumable file formats and disable pause and save buttons accordingly with standalone+Queue download. * If an error occured while update, Please download the files directly from http://dtdm.in, and install.
